Reviews.Title: “Reasonable location but Never again.”

Reviews.Content: location pretty near train station buses taxis surrounded hotels shops etc middle im racist wasnt english sight except partner worse living london breakfast wasnt brilliant 2 types cereal cheap version cornflakes choco balls 4 types bread stale crossaints teacoffee awful machine cold provided uht milk supplied cheap version orange pictures website soooo misleading hotel iv seen bedroom home bigger hotel en suite theres space bed suitcase shower mega tiny shower curtain floor flooded resort washing hair sink whatsoever hairdryer blew dust meant rewash hair wasnt hot water lukewarm hoping kettle supplied provided staff werent nice nice checked helpful friendly rest rude demanding spoke kept head didnt acknowledge lift tiny seen couldnt hotel key meant wait queue key front taking forever charges 3euros hour internet lobby wireless internet expensive mini bar id recommend touch pop shop corner supplies half price service 5euros time fairly clean wasnt cleaned daily nor towels etc replaced daily nice

Reviews.Title: “Good location but....... breakfast and cleanliness of room lets it down”

Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights location staff reception friendly breakfast poor uht milk luke warm drinks drink machine orange squash masquerading orange juice slices stale croissants wasnt expecting fresh teacoffee juice maybe fruit improvement towels changed duration stay grubby floor covered dust

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel terminal 2 nights apart near termini station rome landmarks hotel doesnt offer disappointing socalled 3star hotel plus website mentions hotel refurbished bed dirty kleenex tissues flat sheet covered bed fitted sheet found ourselves mattress morning carpet outdated dirty secondly bathroom smelt cat time shower mildew shower head spilt water faucet dirty sticky 2day stay finally cherry sundae night air conditionning stopped switched temperature outside 30 celsius lot improvement pants cleaning hotel guests satisfaction checked prior departure definitely warn travel agency vigilant suggesting hotel future
